David: ^Hello. Thank you for agreeing to meet with me.
^I’m actually here to talk about Madeline’s murder case. I was wondering if you knew of anything that could be helpful.
^I think it’s unfortunate that she died. She was a big client of mine.
^Not even any photos of that day? I imagine you would have many, considering it is your job.
^I don’t give out my work for free.
Continue_compensated: ^Whatever. As long as I get my payment after this.
^These are some interesting photos I got of that evening. One of Madeline’s supposed lover with Nadine. One of Madeline getting arrested.
^The David hands you two photos, both time-stamped.
^— Photos acquired and will now be stored in the Inventory —
^Hey. I didn’t edit the photos, if that’s what you’re asking.
^Did anyone else come out with Madeline?
^Not that I saw, but her makeup artist was probably in the room with her.
^Why would I have her contact information?
^Oh, alright. Here. Madeline gave it to me so we could coordinate for her “David” photos.
^You’re surprised the David actually had the number.
^Yeah, yeah. Just tell Kaylee to send me the money.
Continue_justice: ^Don’t you want to bring Madeline’s murderer to justice?
^Whatever. As long as I get my payment after this.

^Then David hands you two photos, both time-stamped.
